short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New York Times news about Home, Lifestyle and Everyday Living. Only the best about Cooking, Home décor, Wellness and Family life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you enjoy The New York Times Living? We will make sure you don't miss anything interesting or important. No need to visit NYT website and look for new reviews or articles, NYT Living News Notifier will do it for you. 

As soon as this extension finds anything new in Living Section of NYT it sends you a brief notification right to your browser. No more lost e-mails, no more missed news, no more mailing lists, just a short message right in your Chrome Browser. View it now, or later, or even ignore it. It doesn't annoy or distract you from your current work or leisure. 

All in one. NYT news about:
-	Home
-	Lifestyle
-	Everyday living

It provides readers with practical advice on: 
•	Cooking
•	Home décor
•	Wellness
•	Family life. 

Don't miss most interesting and popular recipes, personal essays, and tips for managing daily tasks or making life more enjoyable. 

Enhance the quality of your life through inspiration, creativity, and useful resources with NYT Living News Notifier.
